short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One stop for all the GMail Accounts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing PigeonHole, the ultimate Chrome extension for efficient mail management and filtering! PigeonHole is the one-stop solution for all your email-related needs, providing you with a streamlined experience that saves you time and effort.
With PigeonHole, you can easily manage and filter out your emails from multiple Gmail accounts, giving you a quick and hassle-free way to stay on top of your inbox. Our extension allows you to view recent mails and OTPs that are filtered out from your accounts, making it easy for you to access important information without having to sift through countless emails.
Say goodbye to cluttered inboxes and endless scrolling - PigeonHole makes email management a breeze. Our user-friendly interface and powerful features ensure that you stay organized and in control, no matter how many emails you receive.
Whether you're a busy professional, a student, or just someone who wants to simplify their email experience, PigeonHole has got you covered. Download our extension today and discover the power of efficient email management!
